trans-unit.source: Describes a character buffer for a text run.
trans-unit.target: Beskriver en tegn buffer for en text-utførelse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> structure using a specified unsafe character string.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> struktur med en angitt unsafe tegnstreng.

trans-unit.source: The caller needs unmanaged code permission in order to invoke the CharacterBufferReference method.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren må ubehandlet Kodetillatelse for å aktivere metoden CharacterBufferReference.

trans-unit.source: Pointer to character string.
trans-unit.target: Pekeren til tegnstreng.

trans-unit.source: The length of `unsafeCharacterString`.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på `unsafeCharacterString`.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> structure using a specified character array.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> struktur med en angitt tegnmatrise.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Char> array.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Char>matrise.</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: The offset to the first character to use in `characterArray`.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvning i det første tegnet du vil bruke i `characterArray`.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> structure using a specified character string.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> struktur med en angitt tegnstreng.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> containing the text characters.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.String>som inneholder teksttegn.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The offset to the first character to use in `characterString`.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvning i det første tegnet du vil bruke i `characterString`.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om det angitte objektet er lik gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal sammenlignes med gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: if obj is equal to the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis obj er lik gjeldende objekt; ellers .

trans-unit.source: If obj is not a object, is returned.
trans-unit.target: If obj is not a object, is returned.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> er lik gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> skal sammenlignes med gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: if value is equal to the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis value er lik gjeldende objekt; ellers .

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fungerer som en hash-funksjonen for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: It is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: Det passer for bruk i nummer algoritmer og data strukturer som en hash-tabell.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the hash code for the current object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>verdi som Representer hash-koden for det gjeldende objektet.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Compare two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> strings for equality.
trans-unit.target: Sammenligner to <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> strenger for likhet.

trans-unit.target: Den første forekomsten av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> skal sammenlignes.
